action.name: Multiattack
entries: The duelist makes two weapon attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Demand Satisfaction.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft {@h} 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 5}, range 30/120 ft. {@h} 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Demand Satisfaction
entries: The duelist chooses a creature it can see within 30 feet and that can see or hear it. That creature must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition Taunted|J:General} by the duelist for one minute (save ends). The condition ends early if the duelist attacks another creature, targets another creature with this action or ends its turn more that 60 feet from the target.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When the duelist is hit by an attack, it can use a reaction to gain a +2 bonus to its AC against the attack, potentially turning a hit into a miss.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The duelist makes two weapon attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Demand Satisfaction.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft {@h} 16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 6}, range 30/120 ft. {@h} 12 ({@damage 2d4 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Demand Satisfaction
entries: The duelist chooses a creature it can see within 30 feet and that can see or hear it. That creature must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition Taunted|J:General} by the duelist for one minute (save ends). The condition ends early if the duelist attacks another creature, targets another creature with this action or ends its turn more that 60 feet from the target.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When the duelist is hit by an attack, it can use a reaction to gain a +2 bonus to its AC against the attack, potentially turning a hit into a miss. If this causes the attack to miss, the attacker takes 4 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage provided it is within the reach or normal range of the duelist's weapons.

The condition ends early if the duelist attacks another creature, targets another creature with this action or ends its turn more that 60 feet from the target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The envenomer makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Toxic Strike
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h} 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition Poisoined|XPHB} for one minute (save ends).

action.name: Daggers
entries: {@atkr mw,rw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h} 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The envenomer takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB} or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The envenomer makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Toxic Strike

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The envenomer takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB} or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Shield Wall
entries: Each creature of the hoplite's choice within 5 feet gains an +1 bonus to their AC and to their Strength and Dexterity saving throws. The hoplite must be wielding a {@item Shield|XPHB} and not {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} to grant this bonus. A creature can only benefit from this trait once at a time, even if multiple adjacent creatures have it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hoplite makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr mw, rw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h} 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h} 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is Large or smaller, it is knocked {@condition Prone}.

reaction.name: Sentinel's Strike
entries: When a creature the hoplite can see enters its reach or makes an attack against a creature other than the hoplite while within its reach, the hoplite can make a special Opportunity Attack with its Spear.

trait.name: Shield Wall
entries: Each creature of the hoplite's choice within 5 feet gains an +1 bonus to their AC and to their Strength and Dexterity saving throws. The hoplite must be wielding a {@item Shield|XPHB} and not {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} to grant this bonus. A creature can only benefit from this trait once at a time, even if multiple adjacent creatures have it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The snatcher makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Kidnapping Strike
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h} 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} (escape {@dc 13}) if it is the snatcher's size or smaller.

While {@condition Grappled|XPHB} in this way, the Grappled creature is also {@condition Silenced|J:General} and the snatcher cannot use this attack. If the snatcher attempts to {@action Hide|XPHB} while grappling the target, it has disadvantage, however, on a success, the Grappled creature is also hidden.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swiper makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Disarming Strike
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h} 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage and the target must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or drop one item of the swiper's choice that it is holding. The swiper can pick up the item as part of the attack.

action.name: Daggers
entries: {@atkr mw,rw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h} 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The swiper takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB} or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swiper makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Disarming Strike
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h} 14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) piercing damage and the target must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or drop one item of the swiper's choice that it is holding. The swiper can pick up the item as part of the attack.

The target is also {@condition Taunted|J:General} by any creature holding the item holding or wearing the stolen item for the next minute, or until it recovers the item. A creature can only be Taunted in this way once at a time.

entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 10}, reach 5 ft. {@h} 38 ({@damage 6d6 + 17}) piercing damage and the target must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or drop one item of the swiper's choice that it is holding. The swiper can pick up the item as part of the attack.

The target is also {@condition Taunted|J:General} by any creature holding the item holding or wearing the stolen item for the next minute, or until it recovers the item. While Taunted, the creature is also {@condition Ligerning|J:General|Lingering (9 psychic)}. A creature can only be Taunted in this way once at a time.

action.name: Daggers
entries: {@atkr mw,rw} {@hit 10}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h} 32 ({@damage 6d4 + 17}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The swiper takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB} or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.
